Html:
I want to copy it , but it only appear when the mouse move over the sequence....

how to copy it ?

Thank you!
If you're talking Rawr2 there is a menu option for copy to clipboard. If you're talking Rawr3/4 then you're out of luck for now.
Thank you very much! I find it in the 'Tools' - 'Copy character stats to Clipborad'.
